title: NTM SafeSecure Voice & Data Renews Focus on Service Excellence
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: NTM SafeSecure Voice & Data 
SOUTHFIELD, Mich., Sept. 10, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Today's businesses have to rely on more technology than ever before to conduct their operations and keep important information from getting into the wrong hands. NTM SafeSecure Voice & Data gives businesses the hardware, software, and telecommunications equipment they need for secure data protection, uninterrupted workflow, and peace of mind. With a newly launched website, NTM renews their dedication to improving IT performance, strengthening data security, and ensuring reliable communications, no matter the budget or time constraints. 
NTM has provided IT support and data protection to Michigan businesses for nearly two decades. The launch of their new website represents a reincarnation that NTM's President, Mike Roth, likes to call, "NTM 3.0." After refocusing their attention on providing skilled and thorough service that delights every client, Roth says, "We've been able to bring on some key players that share our passion for building lasting client relationships that thrive on a foundation of faith and trust." Echoing this statement, NTM's CEO, Kelly Siegel, adds, "We've reinvented our process to enhance every area of our business, and our team is more prepared to carry out our mission than we've ever been before." 
NTM offers a wide range of programs to suit businesses and budgets of any size. Whether a client chooses the simplest service program or the most complex, they can count on NTM to get their network running fast and secure without interrupting their workflow. As Michigan's leading IT service provider, NTM offers business a variety of SafeSecure Managed IT services, including: -- Enterprise Mobility Management -- Access Control & Video Surveillance -- Network Cabling Solutions -- Computers and Hardware -- Cloud-Hosted VOIP Services 
"Every business is unique, and so are their IT needs," says Siegel. "It's our mission to not only meet those needs, but to exceed each client's expectations in every way possible." 
About NTM SafeSecureVoice & Data: NTM provides IT management and robust data security for businesses of any size. Their success is built on a reputation of delighting clients with fast response times, complete transparency, and innovative IT solutions that are uniquely tailored to their operations. To learn how your business can benefit from partnering with NTM, visit www.trustntm.com
